creator: rxiang41@gmail.com
text:
Hi Team,
I found the apache failed with the msg:
Syntax error on line 18 of /etc/apache2/ip_lockdown.conf:
The specified IP address is invalid.
Action 'configtest' failed.
The Apache error log may have more information.
...fail!

the line 18 is :
Allow from 50.59.176.144/32    # allow from 888

It seems that the configtest didn't ignore the comment and treat the 888 as invalid IP.

it works after i changed it to:
Allow from 50.59.176.144/32    # allow from office eight-eight-eight

Please fix the bug. Thank you.

Cheers
Raymond
Only lines that begin with # are comments.
creator: covener@gmail.com
